trans-unit.source: Enables calls from a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] to the HTML window that hosts the application.
trans-unit.target: 可讓來自呼叫[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]來裝載應用程式的 [HTML] 視窗。

trans-unit.source: Instances of this class are exposed through the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.BrowserInteropHelper.HostScript%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Interop.BrowserInteropHelper>.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別的執行個體公開會透過<xref:System.Windows.Interop.BrowserInteropHelper.HostScript%2A><xref:System.Windows.Interop.BrowserInteropHelper>.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.BrowserInteropHelper>屬性</xref:System.Windows.Interop.BrowserInteropHelper.HostScript%2A>

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert the script object to a string representation.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將指令碼物件轉換為字串表示。

trans-unit.source: If the script object cannot be converted to a string, the ToString method returns a string representation of the default property or method.
trans-unit.target: 如果指令碼物件無法轉換成字串，ToString 方法將傳回預設屬性或方法的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the script object, if the object can be converted; otherwise, a string representation of the object's default property or method.
trans-unit.target: 物件的字串表示指令碼，如果物件可以轉換。否則，此物件的預設屬性或方法的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Gets an indexed value from the script object by using the first index value from the indexes collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得索引的值從指令碼物件，使用第一個索引值從 indexes 集合。

trans-unit.source: The TryGetIndex method throws an exception if an invalid access is attempted.
trans-unit.target: 如果嘗試存取無效 TryGetIndex 方法會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The binder provided by the call site.
trans-unit.target: 提供與呼叫位置繫結器。

trans-unit.source: The index to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的索引。

trans-unit.source: The method result.
trans-unit.target: 方法的結果。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: binder is .
trans-unit.target: binderis .

trans-unit.source: -or- indexes is .
trans-unit.target: -or- indexes is .

trans-unit.source: The length of indexes is not equal to 1.
trans-unit.target: 長度 indexes 不等於 1。

trans-unit.source: The first indexes value is .
trans-unit.target: The first indexes value is .

trans-unit.source: The member does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 成員不存在。

trans-unit.source: Gets an member value from the script object.
trans-unit.target: 從指令碼物件中取得的成員值。

trans-unit.source: The TryGetMember method throws an exception if an invalid access is attempted.
trans-unit.target: 如果嘗試存取無效 TryGetMember 方法，就會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The binder provided by the call site.
trans-unit.target: 提供與呼叫位置繫結器。

trans-unit.source: The method result.
trans-unit.target: 方法的結果。

trans-unit.source: Always returns<xref uid="langword_csharp_ true" name=" true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_ true" name=" true" href=""></xref>。

trans-unit.source: binder is .
trans-unit.target: binderis .

trans-unit.source: The member does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 成員不存在。

trans-unit.source: Calls the default script method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫的預設指令碼方法。

trans-unit.source: The TryInvoke method throws an exception if the method does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法不存在，則 TryInvoke 方法會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The binder provided by the call site.
trans-unit.target: 提供與呼叫位置繫結器。

trans-unit.source: The arguments to pass to the default method.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞至預設方法引數。

trans-unit.source: The method result.
trans-unit.target: 方法的結果。

trans-unit.source: Always return <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: binder is .
trans-unit.target: binderis .

trans-unit.source: The method does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不存在。

trans-unit.source: Calls a method on the script object.
trans-unit.target: 指令碼物件上呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: The TryInvokeMember method throws an exception if an invalid access is attempted.
trans-unit.target: 如果嘗試存取無效 TryInvokeMember 方法會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The binder provided by the call site.
trans-unit.target: 提供與呼叫位置繫結器。

trans-unit.source: The arguments to pass to the default method.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞至預設方法引數。

trans-unit.source: The method result.
trans-unit.target: 方法的結果。

trans-unit.source: Always return <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: binder is .
trans-unit.target: binderis .

trans-unit.source: The method does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不存在。

trans-unit.source: Sets a member on the script object by using the first index specified in the indexes collection.
trans-unit.target: 設定指令碼物件上的成員，使用第一個指定的索引中 indexes 集合。

trans-unit.source: The TrySetIndex method throws an exception if an invalid access is attempted.
trans-unit.target: 如果嘗試存取無效 TrySetIndex 方法會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The binder provided by the call site.
trans-unit.target: 提供與呼叫位置繫結器。

trans-unit.source: The index to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的索引。

trans-unit.source: The method result
trans-unit.target: 方法結果

trans-unit.target: binderis .

trans-unit.target: -or- indexes is .

trans-unit.target: 長度 indexes 不等於 1。

trans-unit.target: The first indexes value is .

trans-unit.source: The member does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 成員不存在。

trans-unit.source: Sets a member on the script object to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 設定成員指令碼物件上指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The TrySetMember method throws an exception if an invalid access is attempted.
trans-unit.target: 如果嘗試存取無效 TrySetMember 方法，就會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The binder provided by the call site.
trans-unit.target: 提供與呼叫位置繫結器。

trans-unit.source: The value to set for the member.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定成員的值。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
